title: JSW MG Motor joins hands with Shell for EV charging infra
description: JSW MG Motor India partners with Shell India to deploy CCS 50kW/60kW DC fast chargers, enhancing sustainable mobility and long-distance EV travel. Gaurav Gupta and Sanjay Varkey emphasize customer-centric initiatives and digital integration in their statement, making charging infrastructure accessible for hassle-free EV journeys nationwide.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
